translations: 大而持续或重复的声音（抱怨、哀号等）
喋喋不休地大声说；抱怨说

sentences.sentence: So they pay for all users on Yammer with a corporate email ID.
sentences.translation: 这样他们就得给Yammer上每一个用户提供一个公司email ID。

sentences.sentence: When I saw that Yammer had won, I thought "I must have been mistaken, it is not plain pasta".
sentences.translation: 看到Yammer获选之后，我那时想“我肯定搞错了，它不是普通面条。”

sentences.sentence: If you are a good corporate citizen Yammer would look a bit career-threatening - for reasons explained below.
sentences.translation: 如果你是一个不错的公司人，Yammer对职业生涯会产生危险——原因我在下边解释。
